processes.label: Federal Budget & Appropriations
processes.description: The annual federal budgeting and appropriations process.

steps.title: Agency Requests
steps.description: Agencies submit funding requests to OMB.

steps.title: President's Budget
steps.description: OMB compiles and President submits budget to Congress.

steps.title: Congressional Hearings
steps.description: Committees hold hearings and draft appropriations bills.

steps.title: Appropriations Passage
steps.description: Both chambers pass bills; differences reconciled.

steps.title: Presidential Action
steps.description: President signs or vetoes appropriations bills.

processes.label: Federal Regulatory Rulemaking (APA)
processes.description: Administrative rulemaking under the Administrative Procedure Act.

steps.title: OIRA Review
steps.description: Office of Information and Regulatory Affairs reviews proposal.

steps.title: Congressional Oversight
steps.description: Congress may review or nullify via Congressional Review Act.

processes.label: Federal Impeachment Process
processes.description: The process to remove a federal official from office.

steps.title: House Investigation
steps.description: Judiciary Committee investigates and drafts articles.

steps.title: House Vote
steps.description: Full House votes to impeach (majority required).

steps.title: Senate Trial
steps.description: Senate conducts trial; Chief Justice presides if President.

steps.title: Verdict
steps.description: Senate votes to convict or acquit (two-thirds required).

processes.label: Federal Grant Application
processes.description: Process for state and local governments to apply for and manage federal funding.

steps.title: Notice of Funding Opportunity
steps.description: Federal agency publishes grant opportunity on Grants.gov.

steps.title: Grant Application
steps.description: State or local agency prepares and submits application.

steps.title: Federal Review
steps.description: Federal agency reviews applications and awards grants.

steps.title: Grant Award
steps.description: Federal agency issues grant award; funds allocated.

steps.title: Grant Management
steps.description: Recipient implements program; submits periodic reports and undergoes audits.
